fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

description: A single condition test used in entity filters to evaluate entity state or environment. Tests check properties like health level, time of day, biome type, or nearby entities. Combine tests with AND/OR logic to create complex conditions that control when events fire, which targets are valid, or when behaviors activate.
